title: Christian Robinson Imagines The World
description:
Christian Robinson drew on his hope and imagination to brighten his life and find his way growing up without a lot in L.A. Now he’s a gifted children’s book illustrator telling stories that reflect the life he knows — and shedding light on the unseen kids who are growing up a lot like he did. 

Order Milo Imagines The World, out today

Follow Christian on Instagram, Twitter and Facebook

Check out Christian’s website
